Software Engineer
Full stack Developer - User Experience/User interface Designer - IOS Engineer

Seeking 2020 Software Engineering Summer Intern

Portfolio

Inko Tattoo

I am the IOS developer for Inko which is a tattoo app launched on August 2018. It allows tattoo artists to post their favorite artworks and tattoo lovers can pick what they love to make an appointment with artists. We currently have 1k daily users and 2 ~ 4 trasications per day.

My Role:

IOS front end developer

Technologies:

UIKit, Core Animation, GCD, Core Data, Core Location and various Objective-C Frameworks

DecorHome

I am the sole IOS developer for Furniture Recommendation App. It is a furniture online shopping app that uses facial expression and eye-blinking rates to predict userâ€™s preference

My Role:

Full stack IOS developer

Technologies:

ARKit, XCTest

Google App Scripting

My Role:

Backend Developer

Technologies:

Groovy, Micronaut, Google Apps Script
